To mark their 50th anniversary, The Kinks release 2-CD edition of 1970Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s Lola Versus Powerman and the Moneygoround, Part One via BMG Rights Management (current owner of Sanctuary Records).

The expanded edition of Lola is being shepherded by the noted producer, historian and Kinks archivist Andrew Sandoval. Sandoval has previously been responsible for a number of 2-CD reissues and box sets from the legendary British band Ã¢â‚¬â€œ most recently the 2013 overhaul of 1971Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s Muswell Hillbillies.
